# Progress Ring

```html preview
<div style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; flex-wrap: wrap;">
  <sh-progress-ring percentage="0">0%</sh-progress-ring><br>
  <sh-progress-ring percentage="25">25%</sh-progress-ring><br>
  <sh-progress-ring percentage="50">50%</sh-progress-ring><br>
  <sh-progress-ring percentage="75">75%</sh-progress-ring><br>
  <sh-progress-ring percentage="100">100%</sh-progress-ring>
</div>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                                      | Type     | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `diameter`   | `diameter`   | The diameter of the progress ring in pixels.     | `number` | `128`       |
| `percentage` | `percentage` | The current progress percentage, 0 - 100.        | `number` | `undefined` |
| `stroke`     | `stroke`     | The stroke width of the progress ring in pixels. | `number` | `6`         |
